title: Systematic Instructional Design Model for Video-Based Mathematics Learning

context.additional_context: Course for managers and leaders to enhance mathematical thinking skills required in corporate settings, operating through blended learning combining video content with theoretical and practical case studies

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical concepts using self-directed learning strategies in a video-based learning environment.
Learners can visualize and present mathematical problem-solving processes using generative AI tools.
Learners can develop learning modules to solve job-related mathematical problems by applying video content design principles (human-computer interaction, content structure).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
